sec.title: Acknowledgments
sec.p: This study arose from discussions with a group composed of the following people, in addition to the authors: Peter Ghys (UNAIDS, Geneva, Switzerland), Geoff Garnett (Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation), Nathan Ford (WHO, Geneva, Switzerland), Jeff Eaton (Imperial College London, London, UK), Daniel Low-Beer (WHO, Geneva, Switzerland), Paul Revill (University of York, York, UK), Leigh Johnson (University of Cape Town, Cape Town, South Africa), Ray Shiraishi (US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, Atlanta, GA, USA), Mary Mahy (UNAIDS, Geneva, Switzerland), Shona Dalal (WHO, Geneva, Switzerland), and Marco Vitoria (WHO, Geneva, Switzerland).
